---
title: "Test"
format: 
  beamer:
    variant: -smart
    # this is is needed to not triggered pdf recipe
    output-ext: tex
  beamer+without: 
    # this is is needed to not triggered pdf recipe
    output-ext: tex
  beamer-smart: 
    # this is is needed to not triggered pdf recipe
    output-ext: tex
_quarto:
  tests:
    beamer:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - []
        - 
          # beamer should be detected and not trigger colorlinks by default
          - 'linkcolor=\{blue\}'
          - "``marks''"
          - "`here'"
      printsMessage:
        level: INFO
        regex: "to: beamer-smart\n" 
    beamer-smart:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - []
        - 
          # beamer should be detected and not trigger colorlinks by default
          - 'linkcolor=\{blue\}'
          # setting extensions to format works
          - "``marks''"
          - "`here'"
      printsMessage:
        level: INFO
        regex: "to: beamer-smart\n"  
    beamer+without:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - 
          - "``marks''"
          - "`here'"
        - 
          - 'linkcolor=\{blue\}'
      printsMessage:
        level: INFO
        regex: "to: beamer\n"
---

## Quarto


Test the quotation "marks" here and 'here'.
